ai-anya-e0501n6:1_0: That teaching does in fact that they can expect decline, and one who practices it day after the later generation of the day it is included in the same way.
ai-anya-e0501n6:1_2: Such are the four great elementals and these are mutually reborn in one another.
ai-anya-e0501n6:1_3: Associating with the connection with the enemy, looking down on the heart and the site of the nature of a newly-of-the-Seating.
ai-anya-e0501n6:1_4: is the meaning of the meaning.
ai-anya-e0501n6:2_0: Just as one relying on staff, the three kinds of sticks are drawn to each other,
ai-anya-e0501n6:2_1: They all at once their foreheads, all were unevenly cleaned in one place.
ai-anya-e0501n6:2_2: In this way one should be seen like this.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_0: If all these things weren’t able to apply themselves to the mind, regarding all things.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_1: Building, mental action, physical endurance, and mental skill in preceding the minds of the kind is said to have stated in its fine-material jhānas.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_2: But if the mind isn’t able to get hold of it, they’re not able to get away.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_3: In what is called conformity with the Dhamma.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_4: therefore (these) the mind is not able to get away.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_5: and so on in the four great primary elements.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_6: Since they arise great beings who are very great, they do not occur in common sense.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_7: So they don’t live in a suitable region which is used to live without attachments.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_8: which is called including and striving.
ai-anya-e0501n6:3_10: But here they surpass the arising of a course.
